19.ara-name: كتاب الأضاحى عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Umm Salamah:That the Prophet (ﷺ) said: "Whoever sees the crescent of Dhul-Hijjah, and wants to slaughter a sacrifice he should not take from his hair nor from his nails

chapter.ara-name: باب تَرْكِ أَخْذِ الشَّعْرِ لِمَنْ أَرَادَ أَنْ يُضَحِّيَ
chapter.eng-name: To Avoid Removing One's Hair For Those Who Want To Offer Sacrifice
